column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A weddings has been stopped because of a lack of legal permits.------ A Chinese man was prevented from getting hitched to a Cambodian bride on 1 March 2019.------The case was investigated by immigration police
column5: a 49-year-old male living inChom Chao commune
column10: had not sought permission for the wedding.------Cops informed the Chinese groom that he must get the correct paperwork from authorities if he is to marry and made him sign a different form of contract.
